VPN Gateway

Establish secure, cross-premises connectivity

1RMB Trial Buy Now

Azure VPN Gateway enables you to establish secure, cross-premises connectivity between your virtual network within Azure and on-premises IT infrastructure.

Pricing Details

VPN Gateway

Inbound Inter-virtual network data transfers

data going in between two virtual networks in one region: free

data going in between two virtual networks in different regions (East China Data Center and North China Data Center): free

Outbound Inter-virtual network data transfers

data going out between two virtual networks in one region: free

data going out between two virtual networks in different regions (East China Data Center and North China Data Center): ￥0.16/GB

Outbound P2S (Point-to-Site) VPN data transfer

(ie., data going out Azure virtual network through P2S VPN):

data transferred out of Azure virtual network through the P2S VPNs will be charged in accordance with standard data transfer rates.

FAQ

Expand all
  • Is a usage of less than 1 hour charged for 1 hour?

    Yes. the usage less than 1 hour will be charged for 1 hour.

  • Will the data transfer in the VPN connection be charged separately?

    Yes. Data transfer between two virtual networks is charged at the Inter-VNET rates listed above. And other data transfers over VPN connections to your on-premises site or internet site in general are charged separately in accordance with standard data transfer rates.

  • Is the Inter-VNET transfer charged at the rates of the source region or the destination region?

    It is similar to the standard data transfer charge, and Inter-VNET data transfer is charged at the rates of the source region.

  • Will a Inter-VNET data transfer in the same region be charged?

    No, it will not. Only data transfer between two different regions will be charged, except with P2S VPNs.

  • How many site-to-site VPN tunnels can a VPN gateway support?

    Static-routing VPN Gateway: 1

    Dynamic-routing VPN Gateway: 10

    High-performance VPN Gateway: 30

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support and select self-help service or any other method to contact us for support.

We guarantee at least 99.9% availability of the basic gateway of each VPN or ExpressRoute, 99.95% availability of the standard gateway of each VPN or ExpressRoute, and 99.95% availability of the high-performance gateway of each VPN or ExpressRoute. To learn more about the details of our Service Level Agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreements page.
